title:
Can you provide any information on the naming of GRATHWOL DRIVE in Wilmington, NC.

  I have checked several sources but have been unable to find out any history of the roadway or who it was named after.

  Any references would be appreciated or a list of reference sites I can go to.

   Thanks
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9494
